purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure all routine, requirement, Procedure, Method with quality Standard & Smooth Production as per expectation & Requirement of Buyer & Company. Continuous development of Quality & Production Status.

responsibilities.li_1: Find out and stablish Creative & Innovative ideas align with buyer demand to improve quality standard.
responsibilities.li_2: Monitor the work of Subordinate & develop their skill through continuous training.
responsibilities.li_3: Set Department Goal (Short & Long Term) as well as trace & Analyze them continuously with necessary action.
responsibilities.li_4: Maintain all routine, Method & requirement as per buyer demand at all working area.
responsibilities.li_5: Conduct Bulk Quality Validation at every line & Inspection point minimum 5pcs randomly.
responsibilities.li_6: Ensure quality standard with higher productivity of all section as per customer & company demand.
responsibilities.li_7: Responsible to follow up cut to ship through standard operating procedure.
responsibilities.li_8: Conduct final inspection with buyer QC.
responsibilities.li_9: Conduct all kind of technical & quality audit.
responsibilities.li_10: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take all kind quality Related decision.
authority.li_2: Share Idea to increase Productivity of all section.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure all routine, requirement, Procedure, Method & quality standard of designated area with continuous development.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of Subordinate & develop their skill through continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Maintain all routine, Method & requirement as per buyer & Company demand at allocated working area.
responsibilities.li_3: Conduct Bulk Quality Validation at all allocated working area minimum 5pcs randomly.
responsibilities.li_4: Be up to date about all quality status & Requirement as well as communicate with dept. head for any kind of difficulties.
responsibilities.li_5: To be up-date about goal progress & work accordingly.
responsibilities.li_6: Make instant decision of any quality related issues to run smooth work flow.
responsibilities.li_7: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take all kind of quality related decision of allocated area.

headerTitle.title: Senior Quality Executive
headerTitle.workArea: Entire Quality Dept. & Material Inspection Area.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure all routine, requirement, Procedure, Method & quality standard of designated area with continuous development.

responsibilities.li_1: Collect Order Related all information & Up-date as well as distribute to the respective person at right time to Secure Product quality & Requirements.
responsibilities.li_2: Monitor all Material Quality Inspectors work progress & develop their skill align with buyer up-dates as MQC.
responsibilities.li_3: Monitor total Documentation System of Quality Control Department to Represent the Department to Auditor & Buyers.
responsibilities.li_4: Collect all Guidelines & Up-date information of buyerâ€™s & go through to respective persons and explain to them for implement with continuous monitoring.
responsibilities.li_5: Responsible to monitor all procedures of QC Team as per buyer & Company demand, which is maintain by floor Quality responsible.
responsibilities.li_6: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take all kind of quality related decision of Material & Documentation.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure all routine, requirement, Procedure, Method & quality standard of designated area as per company & Buyer demand.

responsibilities.li_1: Collect Order Related all information & Up-date as well as distribute to the respective person at right time to Secure Product quality & Requirements.
responsibilities.li_2: Prepare Quality Related Documents such as M-list, Buyer Comments, Initial Findings Summary, Manpower Status as well as support to Data Entry with Proper monitoring.
responsibilities.li_3: Maintain Documentation System of Quality Control Department, submit report to department head about daily status of goal data progress.
responsibilities.li_4: Conduct size set sample evaluation & make correction if necessary.
responsibilities.li_5: Describe buyer Updated requirements to quality controllers to make sure proper monitoring of 1st produced garments in order to complete initial process properly.
responsibilities.li_6: Any findings of quality issue on initial garments, share with Sr. Quality Executive and take corrective action and monitoring.
responsibilities.li_7: Having file of new Order details to go through respective person & brief to them about the requirement of Buyer.
responsibilities.li_8: To monitor all procedures of QC Team as per buyer & Company demand, which is maintain by floor Quality responsible.
responsibilities.li_9: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take all kind of quality related decision of initial goods.

maintained.li_7: Pattern Test & Trail Cutting Measurement Report.

headerTitle.title: GPQ
headerTitle.workArea: Material to Ship Quality for Specific Buyer.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure all routine, requirement, Procedure, Method & Product quality standard of designated Buyer as per company & Buyer demand.

responsibilities.li_1: Secure well communication with buyer QC & Factory Merchandiser.
responsibilities.li_2: Make order wise file by Collect order related all Documents & information.
responsibilities.li_3: Attend pre-production, First Production & Pilot cutting meeting to spread out buyer demands to related people.
responsibilities.li_4: Conduct Random Bulk validation from Raw Material to finished product & Carton. Make Decision for any kind of Product quality issues.
responsibilities.li_5: Prepare shipment / Production sample from random bulk goods as well as secure all test routine as per demand.
responsibilities.li_6: Follow up Production status as per shipment date & Qty.
responsibilities.li_7: Conduct Pre-Final Inspection after complete 80% of Shippable goods.
responsibilities.li_8: Conduct Final Inspection with Buyer QC.
responsibilities.li_9: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take decision for product quality, Routine & Method.
authority.li_2: Communicate with Buyer QC for any Up-dates.
authority.li_3: To decide result of pre-final inspection based on inspection findings.

maintained.li_2: Initial / Inline / Final Garments Measurement Report.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure proper maintain, Keeping & Analysis of all Data, Report, Format & Routine as per Buyer Expectation & Company Demand.

responsibilities.li_1: To collect Daily all Quality Related reports from all responsible person with signature.
responsibilities.li_2: Keep record by entry all quality report & analyze all data to submit to Quality Executive.
responsibilities.li_3: Provide all required information & paper to respective person in order to run smooth work flow at all working station by maintain quality requirement.
responsibilities.li_4: Keep all report to designated files as based on Document control system.
responsibilities.li_5: Share quality progress through analysis report to all respective person in order to make sure about their acknowledgement.
responsibilities.li_6: Any findings of report related issue share with Quality Executive and take corrective action and monitoring.
responsibilities.li_7: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Keep all report as per Document Control System.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Monitor Work Flow & Routine of Fabric store as per SOP & Buyer instruction to secure Fabric Quality before delivery for Cutting.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of Subordinate & develop their skill through continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Maintain all routine, Method & requirement as per buyer & Company demand at Fabric Store.
responsibilities.li_3: Make Sure about proper availability & use of approved sample, FTD, MTD during inspection.
responsibilities.li_4: Conduct cross inspection after finish inspection of subordinate randomly.
responsibilities.li_5: Collect Update information of Fabric & spread out to related inspectors to make sure about required quality standard.
responsibilities.li_6: Be up to date about quality status & Requirement of Fabric as well as communicate with dept. head for any kind of difficulties.
responsibilities.li_7: Make instant decision of any quality related issues to run smooth work flow.
responsibilities.li_8: Be up to date about goal progress of Fabric & take necessary action.
responsibilities.li_9: Maintain proper communication With Cutting & Sewing QC In-charge & Provide all information about any kind of Fabric related issue.
responsibilities.li_10: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take decision about material quality related issues.
authority.li_2: Communicate with Supplier about material quality & Routine related issues.

maintained.li_1: Lot Wise Fabric Shrinkage Test Report.
maintained.li_2: Lot Wise Fabric Wash Test Report.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Monitor Regarding Work Flow & Routine of Cutting as per SOP & Buyer Requirement to secure Spreading to Cut panel Quality before delivery to sewing.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of Subordinate & develop their skill through continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Maintain all routine, Method & requirement as per buyer & Company demand.
responsibilities.li_3: Make Sure about proper availability & use of approved sample, Fabric, Pattern, M-List & Order related update Information during inspection.
responsibilities.li_4: Conduct cross inspection after finish inspection of subordinate randomly as well as visit sewing floor to take update about cut panel quality status.
responsibilities.li_5: Collect Update information about Design, Fabric, Measurement & Pattern & spread out to related inspectors to maintain required quality standard.
responsibilities.li_6: Propose to superior for correction of pattern in case found measurement deviation, as uneven shape, looseness, etc.
responsibilities.li_7: Found any quality discrepancies not control under by own, instantly communicate with Senior.
responsibilities.li_8: Make instant decision of any quality related issues to run smooth work flow.
responsibilities.li_9: Be up to date about goal progress of Cutting & take necessary action.
responsibilities.li_10: Maintain proper communication With Sewing QC In-charge & Provide all information about any kind of Cutting related issue.
responsibilities.li_11: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take decision about Layer to cut panel quality related issues.
authority.li_2: Communicate with Merchandising & Buyer Representative Team about quality related updates.

maintained.li_1: Random Inline inspection of cutting & Sewing.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure Expected Quality work with proper maintaining of Routine, Method, SOP & Buyer Requirement at Sewing Floor. Run Smooth Work follow at sewing.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of Subordinate & develop their skill through continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Maintain all routine, Method & requirement as per buyer & Company demand.
responsibilities.li_3: Make Sure about proper availability & use of approved sample, Pattern, M-List, Art Work & Order related update Information during Line Feeding & inspection.
responsibilities.li_4: Check & Confirm every style in detail against Approved Sample, M-List, Material Shade, Technical Instructions after finish every lay out.
responsibilities.li_5: Conduct cross inspection randomly at sewing line against product quality & requirement as well as visit Finishing floor to take update about Product quality status.
responsibilities.li_6: Collect Update information about Design, Requirement, Measurement, Technical issues & spread out to related Peoples to maintain required quality standard.
responsibilities.li_7: Found any quality discrepancies not control under by own, instantly communicate with Senior.
responsibilities.li_8: Make instant decision of any quality related issues to run smooth work flow.
responsibilities.li_9: Be up to date about goal progress of Sewing & take necessary action.
responsibilities.li_10: Maintain proper communication With Finishing QC In-charge & Provide all information about any kind of Sewing related issue.
responsibilities.li_11: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take decision about Finished Garments quality related issues.
authority.li_2: Communicate with Merchandising & Buyer Representative Team about quality related updates.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of Subordinate & develop their skill through continuous training.

responsibilities.li_9: Be up to date about goal progress of Finishing & take necessary action.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Monitor proper maintaining of work flow & Routine of Fabric store. Supervise Fabric inspector to make the inspection functional.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of Fabric Inspectors & develop their skill through continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Maintain all routine, Method & requirement as per buyer & Company demand at material Store.
responsibilities.li_3: Make Sure about proper availability & use of approved sample, FTD, MTD during inspection.
responsibilities.li_4: Conduct cross inspection after finish inspection of Fabric inspectors randomly.
responsibilities.li_5: Collect Update information of Fabric & spread out to related inspectors to make sure about required quality standard.
responsibilities.li_6: Provide necessary equipment & support to the inspector to make them more efficient.
responsibilities.li_7: Communicate with reporting person for any quality related issues to run smooth work flow.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure Work Flow & Routine of Cut & Print Panel Inspection as per SOP & Buyer Requirement to secure expected quality standard with required productivity.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of subordinate & develop their working skill by continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Collect all required paper, information, Sample & Art work of every order from Senior QC on due time before start Cutting as well as make sure about proper understanding of inspectors.
responsibilities.li_3: Provide inspection related necessary equipment to inspectors on due time to make their work smoother.
responsibilities.li_4: Make sure strong follow up at inspection area against quality & Productivity.
responsibilities.li_5: Conduct cross inspection at least 2 time of every person in a day.
responsibilities.li_6: For any kind of findings communicate with Senior QC & QC In-charge for solution with documented record.
responsibilities.li_7: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take decision about cut & Print panel quality is Ok or Not based on findings.

purposeOfThePosition.position: Ensure Work Flow & Routine of Re-cut panel Inspection as per SOP & Buyer Requirement to secure expected quality standard.

responsibilities.li_1: Monitor the work of subordinate & develop their working skill by continuous training.
responsibilities.li_2: Provide inspection related necessary equipment to inspectors on due time to make their work smoother.
responsibilities.li_3: Take up-date about remains fabric of every cutting lot is available for re-cut & provide it to re-cut area with strong follow up.
responsibilities.li_4: Make sure that all re-cut man is following Correct roll of Remains fabric, approved swatch & paper pattern during re-cutting & inspectors are checking properly.
responsibilities.li_5: Conduct cross inspection to ensure re-cut parts are Ok & matching with original bundle.
responsibilities.li_6: For any kind of findings communicate with Senior QC & QC In-charge for solution with documented record.
responsibilities.li_7: Work must be done as per instruction of authorities.

authority.li_1: Take decision about Re-cut panel quality is Ok or Not based on inspection findings.

responsibilities.li_3: Provide inspection related necessary equipment to inspectors on due time to make their work smoother.
responsibilities.li_4: Make sure strong follow up at inspection area against quality & Productivity.
responsibilities.li_5: Conduct cross inspection at least 2 time of every person in a day & Council with them about findings.
responsibilities.li_6: For any kind of major Issue communicate with Line QC, Senior QC & QC In-charge for solution with documented record.
